sense.name: an upward slope
sense.examples: The upgrade was too steep for the old locomotive. What is the upgrade of this stretch of mountain road?

sense.name: improved version of a product
sense.examples: You can download the upgrade to that software for free. The upgrade of that CPU is only $100. John didn't want to pay for upgrades on his new car.

sense.name: an improvement in a reservation
sense.examples: Sally was able to get us upgrades to first class on the flight. For 1000 points the hotel will give you an upgrade to an ocean-view suite.

sense.name: the act of improving something's quality
sense.examples: The upgrade of the power plant will enable it to meet emission standards. The decorator said he could do an upgrade of the restaurant's decor for under $5000.
